title: Data Scientist
description:
Job Title: Data Scientist

Experience Level: 3-5 years

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of proven experience in data science, with a strong background in Python programming, Git, and SQL. The candidate must possess expertise in object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts and classes using Python and demonstrate proficiency in Azure Machine Learning. Additionally, PowerBI skills are considered a plus.




Responsibilities:

Develop and implement machine learning models for predictive and prescriptive analytics.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into data-driven solutions.
Utilize Python, Git, and SQL to clean, preprocess, and analyze large datasets.
Apply statistical methods and machine learning algorithms to extract meaningful insights and patterns from data.
Implement and maintain scalable data pipelines for data processing and model training.
Stay abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously enhance the data science capabilities within the organization.
Present findings and insights to non-technical stakeholders in a clear and understandable manner.
Proficient in SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
Apply machine learning techniques, both supervised and unsupervised, for data analysis and modeling.
Demonstrate proficiency in forecasting techniques to support decision-making processes.
Expertise in Gen AI
Strong proficiency in Excel and PowerPoint for effective communication and presentation of analytical findings.




Requirements:




Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
4-6 years of hands-on experience in data science and analytics.
Strong programming skills in Python with a focus on OOP principles and classes.
Proficiency in version control systems, especially Git.
Solid experience with SQL for data manipulation and extraction.
Expertise in Azure Machine Learning for model development and deployment.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen attention to detail.
Effective communication skills to convey complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.




Preferred Qualifications (Good to Have):

Experience with PowerBI for data visualization and reporting.
Familiarity with other cloud platforms such as Azure
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and tools.
Strong understanding of data privacy and security best practices.




Incase of any further queries, kindly reach out to ramyasrik@quantzig.com
